data.title: 101.9 The Bull ? Page 4
data.text:
Tops in Texas: Wade Bowen Looks to Stay at No. 1 for Third Week

This week Wade Bowen looks to hang onto the top spot for a third consecutive week, but to do it he'll have to hold off Josh Abbott Band, Pat Green and Stoney LaRue. Can one of them beat out Wade, or will When I Woke Up Today hang on to the top spot again? Let’s find out.

Tops In Texas

This week Wade Bowen looks to hang onto the top spot, but to do it he'll have to hold off Brian Keane, Pat Green and Stoney LaRue. Can one of them beat out Wade, or will When I Woke Up Today hang on to the top spot for a second week? Let’s find out.

Tops in Texas: Will Wade Bowen’s New Single Top the Charts?

This week Wade Bowen, Pat Green and Stoney LaRue all look to relieve Sunny Sweeney of the No. 1 spot. Can one of them do it, or will Bad Girl Phase hang on to the top spot for a second week? Let’s find out.

Pat Green's Photoshoot

Pat Green's brand new single out to radio, Girls from Texas, is flying up the charts. Well, now the legendary singer/songwriter is participating in the Down Syndrome Association of Central TX 2015 calendar.

Pat Green + Lyle Lovett Tag-team ‘Girls from Texas’

With his new single, Pat Green is back doing what Pat Green does better than anyone in the world: singin' about Texas.

Part Two: Top 10 Spring Break Texas Music Jams

Warm weather has finally arrived, which means Spring Break is just around the corner ! And if you're anything like me, you're getting your playlists beach-ready. Here is part two of our favorite jams to take with you on your Spring Break adventure: 5...

RTX Sunday Video — Pat Green ‘Dixie Lullaby’

This week for the RTX Sunday Video we highlight one of the best Texans to ever sing or write a song, Pat Green. Released in 2007, off his album “Cannonball” here is “Dixie Lullaby” a song Pat took to No. 26 on the Country Billboard Chart, enjoy...

Pat Green’s New Restaurant + Music Venue ‘The Rustic’ Opening This Month

We've been hearing about it for over a year, and it finally looks like Pat Green is all set to open his brand new bar (with a cool 40+ beers on tap) and live music venue. Green will of course be the first to play "The Rustic," with opening night set for Thursday Oct. 10. Patrons can expect to see both national and local acts playing concert nights, and a full menu every night.

Pat Green, ‘Even the Losers’ – Song Review

Pat Green's cover of Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers' 'Even the Losers' sets a great example for artists considering the inclusion of a cover track on their new album. The Texas country singer delivers a passionate performance of a lyric that is not his own -- but it sure feels like it.

Pat Green Picks Up Hometown Radio DJ Gig to Stay Close to Family

‘Wave on Wave’ hitmaker Pat Green already has a big following of devoted fans, but he’s hoping to rope in some loyal listeners with a new gig he’s trying. The singer has accepted a temporary position as a morning radio host for Austin-based country station KVET for the month of June. Green will join current hosts Chris Mosser and Anne Hudson in the studio as he takes a hiatus from the road. Rea

Pat Green And McWilley Talk About Making Music and Kitchen Renovations

Pat Green is going to be performing live at the Midnight Rodeo in Amarillo on Saturday, October 1. On Wednesday I had a chance to chat with Pat on phone while he was at his house. From the moment the conversation started I could tell he was going to be easy to talk to.
